metadata.title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products,has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
love package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
mame package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
zam-plugins package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
zynaddsubfx package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
libsfml package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
